languages.text: {n}Жуткие насекомые, тревожившие колонию, остались единственным его инструментом, и он затаился. Но когда еретики Последнего восхода подорвали реактор крепости в попытке уничтожить планету, он встревожился и начал искать способ истребить людей. Теперь же последний ксенос мертв, как и вся его раса — по крайней мере, на это уповал каждый обитатель Веабоса-6.{/n}

{n}The fearsome insects, the ones that assailed the colony, were the only tool the xenos had left, so it chose to lie in wait. But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Жуткие насекомые, тревожившие колонию, остались единственным его инструментом, и он затаился. Но когда еретики Последнего восхода подорвали реактор крепости в попытке уничтожить планету, он встревожился и начал искать способ истребить людей. Теперь же последний ксенос мертв, как и вся его раса — по крайней мере, на это уповал каждый обитатель Веабоса-6.{/n}

But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}

languages.text: {n}至于那些袭击殖民地的可怕昆虫，是这只异形之前唯一可以利用的工具。因此，它选择潜伏起来，等待良机。然而，当终末黎明的邪教徒破坏了堡垒的反应堆，企图摧毁这个行星时，异形变得焦躁不安，开始寻找灭绝人类的方法。如今，最后一位异形幸存者死了，它的整个种族也随之灭亡——至少维博斯六号星的所有居民都是这么祈祷的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fearsome insects, the ones that assailed the colony, were the only tool the xenos had left, so it chose to lie in wait. But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}至于那些袭击殖民地的可怕昆虫，是这只异形之前唯一可以利用的工具。因此，它选择潜伏起来，等待良机。然而，当终末黎明的邪教徒破坏了堡垒的反应堆，企图摧毁这个行星时，异形变得焦躁不安，开始寻找灭绝人类的方法。如今，最后一位异形幸存者死了，它的整个种族也随之灭亡——至少维博斯六号星的所有居民都是这么祈祷的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los temibles insectos que asaltaron la colonia eran la única herramienta que les quedaba a los xenos, por lo que optaron por permanecer al acecho. Pero cuando los herejes del Amanecer Final sabotearon el reactor de la fortaleza en su intento de destruir el planeta, los xenos se inquietaron y empezaron a buscar una forma de exterminar a los humanos. Ahora, el último xenos superviviente estaba muerto, y toda su raza también, o al menos eso rogaban todos los habitantes de Vheabos VI.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fearsome insects, the ones that assailed the colony, were the only tool the xenos had left, so it chose to lie in wait. But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los temibles insectos que asaltaron la colonia eran la única herramienta que les quedaba a los xenos, por lo que optaron por permanecer al acecho. Pero cuando los herejes del Amanecer Final sabotearon el reactor de la fortaleza en su intento de destruir el planeta, los xenos se inquietaron y empezaron a buscar una forma de exterminar a los humanos. Ahora, el último xenos superviviente estaba muerto, y toda su raza también, o al menos eso rogaban todos los habitantes de Vheabos VI.{/n}

languages.text: {n}コロニーを襲った恐ろしい昆虫は、ゼノが残した唯一の道具だったため、それを使って待ち伏せすることにした。しかし、最後の夜明けの異端者たちが惑星を破壊しようとして要塞のリアクターを妨害したため、ゼノたちは落ち着きを失い、人間を殲滅する方法を探し始めた。 今、最後のゼノの生き残りは死に絶え、その種族すべてが滅ぼし尽くされた...ていうか、すくなくともヴィアボス・VIの住人全員がそう願っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fearsome insects, the ones that assailed the colony, were the only tool the xenos had left, so it chose to lie in wait. But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コロニーを襲った恐ろしい昆虫は、ゼノが残した唯一の道具だったため、それを使って待ち伏せすることにした。しかし、最後の夜明けの異端者たちが惑星を破壊しようとして要塞のリアクターを妨害したため、ゼノたちは落ち着きを失い、人間を殲滅する方法を探し始めた。 今、最後のゼノの生き残りは死に絶え、その種族すべてが滅ぼし尽くされた...ていうか、すくなくともヴィアボス・VIの住人全員がそう願っていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les terrifiants insectes ayant attaqué la colonie sont les seuls outils dont dispose le xénos, et c'est pourquoi le monstre décide d'attendre, mais quand les hérétiques de l'Aube finale sabotent le réacteur de la forteresse pour tenter de détruire la planète, le xénos s'énerve et commence à chercher un moyen d'exterminer tous ces humains. Maintenant que le dernier xénos est mort, les citoyens de Vhéabos-VI espèrent que plus jamais on n'en reverra sur la planète...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fearsome insects, the ones that assailed the colony, were the only tool the xenos had left, so it chose to lie in wait. But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les terrifiants insectes ayant attaqué la colonie sont les seuls outils dont dispose le xénos, et c'est pourquoi le monstre décide d'attendre, mais quand les hérétiques de l'Aube finale sabotent le réacteur de la forteresse pour tenter de détruire la planète, le xénos s'énerve et commence à chercher un moyen d'exterminer tous ces humains. Maintenant que le dernier xénos est mort, les citoyens de Vhéabos VI espèrent que plus jamais on n'en reverra sur la planète...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die furchterregenden Insekten, die die Kolonie attackiert hatten, waren das einzige Werkzeug, das dem Xenos noch zur Verfügung stand. Also entschied es, sich auf die Lauer zu legen. Als die Ketzer der Letzten Dämmerung aber den Reaktor der Festung sabotierten, um den Planeten zu zerstören, wurde der Xenos unruhig. Er begann, nach einem Weg zu suchen, die Menschen auszulöschen. Nun war der letzte überlebende Xenos tot und mit ihm seine gesamte Spezies — zumindest hofften die Bewohner von Vheabos-VI das inständig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fearsome insects, the ones that assailed the colony, were the only tool the xenos had left, so it chose to lie in wait. But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die furchterregenden Insekten, die die Kolonie attackiert hatten, waren das einzige Werkzeug, das dem Xenos noch zur Verfügung stand. Also entschied es, sich auf die Lauer zu legen. Als die Ketzer der Letzten Dämmerung aber den Reaktor der Festung sabotierten, um den Planeten zu zerstören, wurde der Xenos unruhig. Er begann, nach einem Weg zu suchen, die Menschen auszulöschen. Nun war der letzte überlebende Xenos tot und mit ihm seine gesamte Spezies — zumindest hofften die Bewohner von Vheabos-VI das inständig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zeno, elindeki tek silahın koloniye saldıran korkunç böcekler olduğunu bildiği için beklemeyi seçti. Lakin Nihai Şafak'ın kâfirleri, gezegeni yok etme amaçları uğruna kalenin reaktörünü sabote ettiğinde zeno rahatsız olmuş ve insanların kökünü kurutmak için yollar aramaya başlamıştı. Son zeno da ırkının geri kalanıyla birlikte ölmüştü... Ya da en azından Vheabos VI'nın sakinleri öyle umuyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fearsome insects, the ones that assailed the colony, were the only tool the xenos had left, so it chose to lie in wait. But when the heretics of the Final Dawn sabotaged the fortress's reactor in their attempts to destroy the planet, the xenos grew restless and started searching for a way to exterminate the humans. Now the last xenos survivor was dead, and so was its entire race — or at least, so prayed every denizen of Vheabos VI.{/n}
